stories.text:
Hey HN!

I just want to share my weekend project. So a couple days ago I read an article here about Quadratic Voting, and I'm really interested to implement it myself. After some browsing I found only a couple other poling websites which used QV, but I found that their interfaces less intuitive. So I created https://puaspoll.com . Its very simple, but I think it could be a fresh approach compared to many similar polling website/apps. Let me know what you think!

Best regards
stories.title: Show HN: I made a polling app based on Quadratic Voting

stories.text: Most of my career has been in construction management. I'm soon interviewing with a slightly related SaaS company who I would classify as a startup. This isn't a world that I have any experience in, what things should I be considering and aware of?
stories.title: Ask HN: What do I need to think about before going to work for a startup?
